## FreshLibrary.addition() method

Adds two numbers together.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addition(a: number, b: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  a | number | The first number. |
|  b | number | The second number. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The sum of two numbers.
